analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#117-118) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#215-251)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#330-353)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#424-439)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#442-460)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#524-528) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#264-282):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#279-280)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#281)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#555-570) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#567-570)

Escapable.escapeHatch (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#761-774) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(escapeHatchDestination,balance) (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#773)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#491) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#532-535)

Reentrancy in GivethCampaign.doPayment (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#886-911):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(tokenContract.controller() != 0) (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#890-891)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalCollected (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#898)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#524-528)
	- /unique_chucks/28/0x98cdcf8cd44c216fe370cf5c420d9630ae916fc4.sol#526-528
